Class OAuthModule

java.lang.Object

All Implemented Interfaces:
org.forgerock.caf.authentication.api.AsyncServerAuthModule
public class OAuthModule extends Object implements org.forgerock.caf.authentication.api.AsyncServerAuthModule
Authentication Module used for OAuth authentication(Authorization).
